Eligibility_criteria: Functional:Functional Knowledge in the area of Data Migration, Implementation , Technical Knowledge in Scripting and Cloud Services
Behavioral:Team work & Collaboration , Initiative , Planning & Result Orientation
job_description: Data Migration Tools: Proficiency in data migration tools and technologies, such as ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) tools, data mapping, and data transformation techniques.
Database Skills: Strong knowledge of database systems, including SQL and NoSQL databases, as data migration often involves transferring data between different database platforms.
Scripting and Automation: Skills in scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell) to automate migration processes, perform data validation, and handle repetitive tasks.
Cloud Services: Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their migration services, as many organizations are migrating to the cloud.
Version Control: Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage and track changes in migration scripts and configurations.
Monitoring and Performance Tuning: Knowledge of tools and techniques for monitoring migration progress and optimizing performance during large-scale data migrations.
Security and Compliance: Understanding of data security and compliance requirements, especially when handling sensitive or regulated data during migrations.
Backup and Disaster Recovery: Proficiency in backup and disaster recovery procedures to ensure data integrity and availability during migration and rollback scenarios.
Containerization and Orchestration: Knowledge of containerization platforms (e.g., Docker) and container orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes) for managing application migrations.
Testing and Validation: Expertise in data validation, quality assurance, and testing methodologies to ensure the accuracy and completeness of migrated data.
Documentation and Reporting: Strong documentation skills to create detailed migration plans, reports, and post-migration documentation for audit and reference purposes.
Collaboration Tools: Proficiency in collaboration and project management tools (e.g., JIRA, Confluence) to facilitate communication and tracking of migration tasks.

Eligibility_criteria: Proven experience as a Data Scientist, preferably in Campaign Effectiveness or Market Research domain.
Expertise in causal inference, machine learning, and SQL.
Proficiency in advanced R program for modeling and analytics.
Experience with SPSS for data exploration.
Strong understanding of data governance and database management.
job_description: Conduct causal inference, including hierarchical modeling, difference-in-differences, and using controls, with expertise in longitudinal design.
Apply Machine Learning skills for imputation and quick drivers analyses.
Familiarity with Campaign Effectiveness data and database, including an understanding of the unique methodologies required for this design.
Execute modeling tasks in R for complex analyses.
Utilize SPSS for ad hoc exploratory data analysis.
Proficient in SQL for data retrieval, manipulation, and database creation across multiple studies.
Perform static annual norms calculations efficiently, with knowledge of post-curve completion code.
Contribute to institutional knowledge regarding normative standards, cleanup processes, and consequences.
Execute data pulls for curves using SQL, ensuring alignment with normative standards.
Manage years of curves in an R-based application involving thousands of curves.
Join curves to an adjustment file through modeling.
Conduct all procedures and cleaning in R, recognizing the time-intensive nature of replicating processes.

Define and review technical architectures, both at high and low levels of design.

Build, develop, and guide high-performing talent, establishing a long-term talent strategy spanning technology domains.

Act as an unblocker in an agile environment, assisting architects, analysts, and developers with challenges and problem-solving. Engage in hands-on coding while mentoring or assisting other team members.
Stay abreast of emerging technologies and trends in engineering and development within the BFSI domain.
Act as a technology evangelist, representing the company in external forums.
Overall experience of 15+ years. Minimum 5 years experience in Solutioning Enterprise Mobile and Web Applications preferably for BFSI products.
Extensive hands-on experience in Backend, Web, Mobile, Cloud, Artificial Intelligence technologies.
Proficiency with server side languages like Java / Node.js / Python.
Proficient in using architecture modeling tools and frameworks.
Solid understanding of security, data privacy, and compliance considerations in the BFSI sector.
Preferably having a good understanding of regulatory frameworks governing the BFSI sector, such as RBI Guidelines, DPDPA, PCI DSS and industry-specific regulations.
Experience in designing and implementing microservices-based architectures.
Knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
Proficiency in designing, implementing, and managing APIs for seamless integration of systems.
Experience in at least one Cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP) platform.
Strong knowledge of native and cross-platform technologies - Android, Kotlin, iOS, Swift, Objective C, React Native, Flutter and working with MVVM, MVP, MVC patterns.
Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Node, Angular and React.
Familiarity with database technology such as Oracle, MySQL and MongoDB.

Continually updating skills and learning new platforms with working on multiple platforms
